alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 10:44PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Prowers and southeastern Kiowa Counties through 1115 PM MDT... At 1044 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Towner to 11 miles northeast of Two Buttes. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Prowers and southeastern Kiowa Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
